about.title: ABOUT
about.description: I'm 23 years old, working as a software developer since 2020 on various projects and companies. Currently, I'm a Full Stack developer mainly focused on TypeScript, NodeJS, Python, NextJS (ReactJS), Go, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB & AWS/GCP.

mackleaps_intern.title: MACKLEAPS - Full Stack Intern
mackleaps_intern.description: Technical leadership, development and support in projects Participated in Oriente platform development. Developed MackLeaps website. Javascript, Typescript, React, NodeJS, Go, Java, Docker, APIs REST, SQL, GitHub, SOLID, GitLab.

mackleaps_fullstack.title: MACKLEAPS - Full Stack Developer
mackleaps_fullstack.description: Responsible by guide & teach new interns, leadership, tasks organizations, project management & development in Back-End and Front-End. Participated in ACSP website development TypeScript, React, NodeJS, Python, NestJS, Docker, Ruby, PostgreSQL, MongoDB & MySQL.

agentesdev_fullstack.title: AgentesDev - Full Stack Developer
agentesdev_fullstack.description: Participated in UJL Portal Web scraper development. TypeScript, JavaScript, Express NextJS, HTML5, CSS, Sass Tailwind & Python

sossego_back.title: Sossego - Back End Developer
sossego_back.description: Encharged to create & maintenance robots for webscraping using Playwright, NodeJS, NestJS, Python, Docker & development in API's.

bolha_fullstack.title: Bolha - Full Stack Developer
bolha_fullstack.description: Encharged to develop/maintenance websites and APIs for our clients using Next JS/React, PHP, Cosmic, Strapi, TypeScript, NodeJS & AWS.
